model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker B: About that Bluegrass show -- A friend of mine mentioned that he has a cabin he won't be using only about 20 minutes away. Do you and your wife want to stay there so you can make it? Might be a more comfortable way for your wife to camp. Let me know. 
Speaker B: That would be lovely! We can totally pay your friend to use the cabin if they would like.
Speaker A: I will let them my friend know that you are interested.  I think I might head out that way myself and camp out for the festival too.
Speaker B: Nice! Is anyone coming with you?
Speaker A: Just my doggy Drunky.  You never know,  I might meet a nice lady out there. 
Speaker B: Totally.  There will be a bunch of women there and it'll be easy to strike up conversations.  Just be confident and I'm sure you could walk away with a bunch of numbers.
Speaker A: Oh, I definitely will. Thanks for the motivation. Is this going to me your first festival?
Speaker B: No, I used to go to them all the time.  This will be my first one in a while and probably my last since my wife and I are about to have our baby.
Speaker A: You could make this one festival your "escape" every year. Don't give up the festivals, you need to have something to keep you happy.

MEMORY:
[Speaker A does not live in Mexico but likes Mexican food and women.] - (SameTopic) - [Speaker B's wife is pregnant and currently in the second trimester, still working.]  
[Speaker B is a mechanic who enjoys working on cars.] - (React) - [Speaker B is not going out drinking much due to their wife's pregnancy.]  
[Speaker A owns a Subaru Legacy and mentions having a baby on the way.] - (React) - [Speaker B is feeling a bit jealous of Speaker A's ability to go out and enjoy live music while they are at home with the pregnancy.]

Judgement: Yes
